title: Scientists say that strange signals "probably " come from space intelligence?
subtitle: Astronomers have analysed a spectrometer database of 2.5 million stars and have not been able to explain the nature of 234 of them, but while authors have already suggested aliens as an explanation, their certainty is exaggerated in the media and has been mitigated by other scientists.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Two scientists who analysed 2.5 million stars concluded that the signals from a small part of them were "perhaps" because of foreigners.
